word:
Chap. 214 - To G. I. Butler

                                                        B 130, 1910 

                                  Sanitarium, Calif., Nov. 23, 1910 

Dear Brother Butler,-- 
     I have received and read your letter. It was full of interest to me, and I was much pleased to hear from you. I appreciated your letter very much, and have been waiting for an opportunity to respond to it.
